ygData.subject: Tailoring Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Fellow Monks I am a tailor of a good deal of experience and was hoping that someone could answer a question for me.  I hunt in East Commonlands and
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Fellow Monks

I am a tailor of a good deal of experience and was
hoping that someone could answer a question for me. I
hunt in East Commonlands and therefore tailoring is a
simple skill to use because pelts are so common.
However, Patchwork has become too easy for me and I
have done some research into Studded Leather. As most
of you know, making studded armor requires studs. I
do not wish to take the time to make studs because
what I like most about tailoring is I do not have to
spend time doing it, I just kill animals and use their
pelts. Does anyone know if it is possible to buy
studs, or anyone on the Karana Server near Freeport
who sells them.

-Worlord
worlord99@...

Hammeron
11th Circle Monk
Karana Server
